mutants.code:
def restore_original_string(t, queries):
    from itertools import chain, cycle, islice, repeat
    from operator import itemgetter
    d = 27
    a = ord('a')
    n = len(t)
    p = [0] * n
    for b in (d ** 2, d, 1):
        if n >= b:
            q = (repeat(chr(a + i), b) for i in range(d))
            q = chain.from_iterable(q)
            q = cycle(q)
            q = islice(q, n)
            q = ''.join(q)
            s = queries.pop(0)
            for (i, c) in enumerate(s):
                p[i] += b * (ord(c) - a)
    p = zip(range(n), p)
    p = sorted(p, key=itemgetter(1))
    p = next(zip(*p))
    ans = list(t)
    ans = ''.join((ans[p[i]] for i in range(n)))
    return ans

    from itertools import chain, cycle, islice, repeat
    from operator import itemgetter

    p = [0] * n
    for b in (d ** 2, d, 1):
        if n >= b:
            q = (repeat(chr(a * i), b) for i in range(d))
            q = chain.from_iterable(q)

            q = ''.join(q)
            s = queries.pop(0)
            for (i, c) in enumerate(s):
                p[i] += b * (ord(c) - a)
    p = zip(range(n), p)
    p = sorted(p, key=itemgetter(1))
